title: Solid place to stay.
text: Nice location in Ames, quick access to Hwy 30 yet far enough away to avoid the road noise. Within a reasonable walking distance to Jack Trice Stadium for football. Our room was clean and comfortable. They did a reasonable selection for breakfast considering Covid.
place: Comfort Inn & Suites near ISU Campus

title: Good Dinner
text: One of the few sit down restaurants we could find open for dinner. Service was prompt and friendly. We shared a brisket taco platter and our servicer was kind enough to bring an extra plate without being prompted which was unexpected.

title: Worth the drive
text: Well maintained steep roadway with plenty of width for turning movements. The brick pavers provided good traction so no slippage.

title: Comfortable and Quiet
text: Stayed here for one night. The building is set back from the highway so one does not hear any road noise. Found the building to be very clean, and the room large and comfortable. Due to covid the breakfast was grab and go, which is understandable. Would stay here again.

title: Solid Chinese Buffet
text: Stopped in for for lunch and was not expecting a Buffet. Good variety to select from and the quality was better than most lunch buffets.

title: Good Historic Hotel
text: This is a historic hotel in the downtown area. We found our room to be large, clean and comfortable. The room was very quite considering being downtown. The cooked to order breakfast (served during covid) was very good.

title: Great Value for BBQ
text: My wife and stopped here for dinner. I had a brisket sandwich which contained at least twice the quantity of meat that i expected. Not to mention tasty. The fried potato side dish was also very good and a generous quantity. Excellent value.

title: Great Small Town Restaurant
text: Stopped in for dinner for two. Very nice atmosphere. Nice selections on the menu to chose from. Our server was prompt and friendly. My wife and I both enjoyed our meals. Would certainly stop here again if in the area.

title: Small Town Iowa Treasure
text: We typically visit here for dinner but our timing worked out better for lunch this time. My wife and I went with the lunch special of roast pork potato casserole. It just doesn’t get much better than that. Enough said,

title: Unique Structure
text: One does not typically find a structure like this in Iowa. Pleasant scenic drive to get there. Nice views from the top of the tower.

title: Great Tribute to the Duke
text: Very well done museum with a nice 11 minute tribute film running every 15 minutes. Everything is displayed nicely and numbered and captioned for explanation in the museum. Glad to see the building will be expanded to include more displays. We will certainly visit again when it is completed. The narrative given in the birthplace house was well done.

title: Solid Mexican Restaurant
text: Stopped in for dinner and found the menu had plenty of choices. Also nice to see that some of the dinners included sides other than rice and re_fried beans.

title: Great Small Town Historic Hotel
text: Nice historic building in small town Iowa for a quiet night. The room was large, comfortable and clean. Very nice bed and pillows. It was fun to get a tour and verbal history of the building from the staff. Would certainly stay here again.

title: Fantastic Hotel
text: Fantastic renovation of a historic office building into a luxury hotel. The hotel just opened about two weeks ago and is stunning. Staff was friendly and helpful. The room large and comfortable. I would typically expect to pay over $300 per night for a room here but was less than half this.

title: Fantastic Hotel
text: We stayed here 2 nights. The staff was very attentive and friendly, which we have not been finding much of this year. The entire property was renovated this year and is spotlessly clean. The room was well appointed and very comfortable. Both the hotel bar and restaurant were open which is another thing we are not finding this fall. We will certainly stay here again when in the area.

title: Tenderloin at it’s best
text: My wife and I travel Iowa to sample the best tenderloins. There is a reason this is the best for 2020. It was incredibly tender, not chewy at all. We got a side of waffle fries which were extremely good. We called in our order before they opened for lunch and good thing we did as cars were lined up for take out orders. Still only 20 minutes from call to pickup. Great thing to happen to another small Iowa town.

title: Great food and service
text: Not often does a hotel restaurant get such high ratings but is well deserved. Our server was prompt and friendly for dinner. The food was good and nice to receive a certificate for a free dessert at hotel check in. And the dessert is with it. We also had breakfast here which was a great value. Our server, Angel, was friendly and took great care of us.

title: Great Hotel
text: Nice to find a hotel where the staff was friendly and happy to greet us when we arrived and throughout our stay. Beautiful hotel and very clean comfortable room. Also good to see the bar and restaurant were open, which is uncommon during these times. Very highly recommend the property.

title: Good food good service
text: Stopped here for dinner. We started with a bottle of wine and cheese and salami. The serving portions were very generous and the cheese so good we asked where we could buy it. Then had soup. My wife had chicken noodle which had excellent homemade noodles and I had tomato basil which was a deep ruby red color. The best tomato soup I’ve ever tasted. During all of this bread kept arriving at our our table. Service was prompt and friendly. We ended the night with very good desserts. Highly recommend eating here.

title: Great Hotel
text: Beautiful historic property nicely restored. Buildings aren’t designed like this anymore. The room was comfortable with nice furnishings as were the common areas. I would give a 5 rating if staff would have been friendlier. No one was rood, but during our 2 night stay only one person initiated a greeting and asked if I needed anything. This would not prohibit us from staying here again.

title: Great Place
text: Had lunch here, of course a tenderloin. Very nice to see a selection of sizes for the tenderloin. Service was very promptly and very friendly. My wife had the ham and bean soup as a side which she said was excellent. Would eat here again if in the area.

title: Solid Breakfast
text: Stopped in for breakfast. We were seated promptly and asked for our drink order which was served promptly. I had bacon, eggs and hash browns which were all prepared very well. our server was attentive and pleasant.

title: Very Good Dinner
text: Had dinner here on a Sunday night. Tables were nicely separated and made somewhat private with small partitions along the perimeter. A nice selection of wines is available along with a variety of entrees to select from. The food was well prepared and served in a timely manner.

title: Solid Chinese Restaruant
text: Stopped in for lunch, and found the place to be very clean and well organized. We were seated promptly and asked for our drink order. A very nice selection for lunches. I had wonton soup for a side and found it to be one of the best soups I’ve tasted in a Chinese restaurant. My wife had an egg roll and she also said it was one of the best she has had. The entrees were also very good and property sized for lunch. Service as very fast and friendly. Would certainly eat here again.

title: Certainly not low calorie
text: Very large variety of quality candies and other items to shop for. Many hand made chocolates to select from.

title: Great Craftsmanship
text: The life sized hand carved wood nativity scene is worth the visit. Nice photos of how the work was performed. I am sure the gardens are beautiful in times other than winter.

title: Nice Small City Art Museum
text: Very nice modern building which displays the art well. High percentage of photographic art nicely done. The Grant Wood mural is worth the visit. One should spend several minutes sitting and studying the paintings as the longer your eyes adjust to the light, the more you can notice in the art work.

title: Very worthwhile
text: Great place to learn about the historic expedition of Lewis and Clark. Very nice building containing many nice exhibits. Interesting robots telling the story.

title: Unique place
text: Seldom see a boat for a welcome center, but they do a nice job. Interesting atmosphere with friendly staff and good resources.
place: Sergeant Floyd River Museum and Welcome Center

title: Wiener House is a. Winner
text: Very unique place that one does not see much of anymore, especially that has been in business for over 100 years. They have a limited menu and do it very well. The line moves very quickly. The place is exceptionally clean. Great place for lunch.

title: Good Place for Dinner
text: Service was prompt and friendly. Nice atmosphere and good meal. Good selection of beers, liquors and specialty drinks. Would eat here again if in the area.

title: Part of USA history
text: Scenic views from significant place in American history. Only takes a few minutes to visit and worth the time.

title: Good Stay
text: Stayed here two nights. The room was spotlessly clean and spacious. Very good bed and pillows. Good location for getting around the area. Nice boxed breakfast; doing the best they can during a pandemic.
place: Hampton Inn & Suites Sioux City South

title: Solid Mexican Restaurant
text: Good food, excellent service. Had dinner here and found the staff friendly and attentive. Good selection to select from. Would certainly eat here again.

title: Good Place for Dinner
text: Was surprised to see this in the Hard Rock. Service was friendly and prompt. Dinners had generous portions. Good selection of beers and speciality drinks.

title: FUNKY GOOD BREAKFAST
text: Another great find on TripAdvisor near me. Good small town Iowa breakfast the way it should be. Service was good with well prepared food.

title: GREAT SMALL TOWN RESTAURANT
text: I had steak de burgo and my wife had stake salad, both were very good. The quality of the meat was top. The servers worked hard to make sure we were well attended to. We split the mixed berry short cake which was excellent.

title: REAL DEAL BBQ
text: Stopped here for an early lunch. The owner promptly greeted us escorted to a table and said he had just pulled the brisket out of the cooker. My wife went with the brisket and I ordered the 3 sliders to be able to do some sampling. All of the meats were melt in your mouth and very tasty. The brisket was the shining star. I'm sure we have eaten at over a hundred BBQ places and this brisket is a top 3. The next time we are in the area we will be back and I will be getting the brisket.

title: Good Mexican
text: A very good place for Mexican food and a great margarita. Service was very fast and friendly and our order was served promptly.

title: Good Restaurant
text: I must clarify that my wife and I did not get inside the restaurant. We were staying in the hotel next to the restaurant and since it was late November and somewhat chilly and the only ones who were going to eat there, they asked if they could take our order and bring it over to the hotel as they did not want to turn the heat on. We agreed. They brought us menus, we ordered and our food was delivered as promptly as they could cook a made to order meal. We each had pork chops which were very good as was the pepper pie.

title: Nice Hotel
text: We stayed here for one night and found the hotel to be very restful. The room was large and comfortable. We ate at the in house restaurant which I recommend. I had the water buffalo which was tasty. My wife had a dish with noodles which she said was excellent. We were told the noodles were made with water buffalo milk. Always good to try new things. Highly recommend a boat trip on the lake which you can book directly across the street.

title: Good Pizza, Good Service
text: My wife and I stopped here for a light dinner. The server heard us discussing what toppings to have on our pizza. He said he would be happy to split the toppings so each of us could get what we wanted. Our pizza was served promptly and we found it to be very good.

title: Nice Charming Stay
text: We stayed here for one night and very much enjoyed our visit. Staff was friendly and helpful. Nice balcony to sit and read or look over the city and river. The breakfast was one of the best, cooked to order breakfasts we have had at a hotel anywhere in the world. We were served a chick pie which was fabulous.

title: Another Good WH Experience
text: A good experience at this Waffle House. Service was prompt and friendly. The food was prepared well and my Texas Cheese Steak sandwich was not over cooked which is common at some WH's.

title: Science and HIstory in One Location
text: So much history at this site which can be seen on the bus tour. Best to arrive before the place opens as there will be lines everywhere. I suggest to plan your visit in advance and have an idea of what you want see and know what time the movie or event begins.
place: NASA Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex

title: Good Italian
text: I had lasagna which was certainly in the top 5 lasagnas I've eaten. My wife had ravioli which had an outstanding cream sauce. Service was prompt and friendly. Would certainly eat here again.

title: Nice Remodeled Hotel
text: We found the rooms to be clean and comfortable. The hotel is located on a 3 minute walk from the beach. There are plenty of good restaurants within walking distance or a short drive. Plenty of on site parking.

title: VERY GOOD BBQ
text: Very good meats, nice selection of sauces and the service was prompt and friendly. Our meals arrived very promptly. Would certainly eat here again if in the area.

title: Another must see
text: Of course if you come to Athens this is a must see. Suggest getting there by 8:30 so you don’t have to complete with hundreds of people who think having 5 photos of this temple mostly obscured with their face is better than a photo showing the stunning structure by itself.

title: Another Fine Athens Museum
text: Vast display of paintings, sculptures and artifacts with each section containing a few paragraphs of the historical significance of time segment.

title: Very Nicely Done
text: The museum is well organized and in chronological order of military history. A nice variety of displays consisting of guns and other weapons paintings and sculptures. Also a nice static display of aircraft outside the building.

title: Worth a visit
text: It’s difficult to get an idea of the scale of the building and the structural members until one gets inside and walks around it. Glad we went in.

title: Good Food and Service
text: The atmosphere is unique with trees extending from the floor out through the roof. Nice variety of food on the menu which we found tasty. Service was friendly and prompt.

title: Solid Hotel
text: The location was excellent for visiting the Acropolis, museums, shopping and restaurants. Our room was clean and comfortable with a nice sized balcony. The bar had some tasty mixed drinks and service was excellent. Breakfast had plenty to choose from.

title: Must See
text: Mankind can now put people into space on a regular basis but nothing like the Parthenon constructed over 2,000 years ago will ever be built again with the awe inspiring beauty and craftsmanship.

title: Very Nice
text: The very modern building does a great job of making the relics stand out. Very interesting that the building is constructed over an archeological site such that one can walk under the building to observe the excavation. Currently there is a temporary exhibit that has nice captioned photos and a good video showing how buildings at the acropolis were/are being restored with interviews of those working on it.

title: Outstanding!!
text: I have been to over 25 countries and eaten at hundreds of restaurants and the chocolate ganache has to be the best dessert I’ve tasted. And the rest of what we had was superb as well. My wife and I ate here twice during our short stay in Athens. So very refreshing to find a restaurant that concentrates on doing a limited number of menu items extremely well. The decor is refined yet fun at the same time. Also, you can have a nice conversation with those at your table with out raising your voice. And the prices are very reasonable. I highly recommend dinner here.

title: Very Pleasant Stay
text: We very much enjoyed our stay at Hotel Rex. We were greeted warmly upon arriving and escorted to our room after being served tea. The room was very spacious and clean. There was a good variety of things to choose from for breakfast. They even brought freshly fried eggs to our table when the guests ahead of us had taken all that were out. We were given a nice recommendation for dinner just two doors away. Very good value.

title: Must see of course
text: What else can I say that hasn’t already been said. I highly suggest arriving when the gate opens as t is much nicer to share the experience with a hundred people instead of thousands.

title: Great, Cozy Fresh Italian
text: Very nice quiet and cozy place for a fresh Italian meal. Service was friendly, fast and professional. The food was served promptly and was very tasty and the prices were very reasonable. The quality of the ingredients was excellent. The best part was it was not full of loud tourists so you could have a nice conversation. My wife and I each had pasta and both were very good. There is an open kitchen so one can watch the meals being prepared. I highly recommend this for a nice diversion from Greek Food.
